mean_cn: n. 讲词提示器，读稿机
mean_en: an electronic device that makes it possible for people speaking on a television programme to read text while looking directly at the television camera
word_etyma: tele电 + pro前 + mpt拿到 + er表名次，机器→teleprompter提词器
sentence: Thank god for the teleprompter, it saved me when I forgot the script.
sentence_trans: 多亏了提词器，它在我忘掉台词的时候帮了我一把。
